articles.title: BBC Issues Apology Over ‘High Risk’ Bob Vylan’s Controversial Glastonbury Performance - Variety
articles.summary: BBC Issues Apology Over ‘High Risk’ Bob Vylan’s Controversial Glastonbury Performance The BBC has issued a formal apology after allowing a “high risk” act to perform live at Glastonbury, despite internal warnings about Bob Vylan‘s potential for controversial content. The performance aired on the broadcaster’s platforms and contained what the BBC described as “offensive and deplorable behavior” related to antisemitism.
